extendedInfo.description: The ultimate camera effects application, 30 free live camera effect filters, apply sketch, colour, mirror and distortion effects in real time with a live preview!Now watermark free!*â Custom filter creator: Combine effects with the editor in an order of your choice e.g. Sketch and then Wave, or Ripple, Invert then Edge detect. You can create about 400 different permutations in the free version!In the paid version, chain up to 6 effects at once for 50 Million+ permutations!!â Load existing photoâ Not post-processed effects, real time effects applied to the camera feed!â A number of effects are animated, like water reflection, ripple, twist and wave effects!â Menu system shows live previews of 6 filters at once!Effects include:â One Colour - touch the screen to set the colour - takes photos just like our iconâ Sketchâ Thermal camera simulationâ Strong Lens / fisheye / buldgeâ Narrow focusâ Blurâ Embossâ Edge detectâ Wavey - animatedâ Water reflection - animatedâ Ripple - animatedâ Twist / twirl - animatedâ TV Pixels - animatedâ Pixelate / pixelated - animatedâ Mirrorsâ Colour filters, sepia, greyscaleâ Zoom if your camera supports itâ Multicamera support for those who have more than one camera and Android 2.3.3+â Saves photos to SD Card DCIM/LiveFX/EULA and privacy statement here (also available in app): http://eawapps.blogspot.com/2011/10/live-fx-end-user-license-agreement-and.html*Watermark free as long as adverts are not blocked.
